Term Similarity¶

A number of classes are defined to calculate various types of term similarity. All these classes conform to the BaseTermSim interface.

BaseTermSim Class¶

class ggtk._BaseTermSim.BaseTermSim(sim_proxy)[source]¶

Bases: object

An abstract term similarity class to provide a nice interface to python for a number of C++ term similarity classes.

calculateNormalizedTermSimilarity(term_a, term_b)[source]¶

Return the similarity between the two terms

calculateTermSimilarity(term_a, term_b)[source]¶

Return the similarity between the two terms

termSimilarity(term_a, term_b)[source]¶

Return the similarity between the two terms, a shorter method name

TermSimilarity module¶

TermSimilarity Module This module defines the term similarity classes which inherit from the base BaseTermSim python class

Bases: ggtk._BaseTermSim.BaseTermSim

A class to calculate Jiang Conrath Similarity using a shared infromation calculator (other than MCIA) Full details available in ggtk/ModularJiangConrath.hpp

class ggtk.TermSimilarity.PrecomputedMatrixTermSimilarity(matrix_file)[source]¶

Bases: ggtk._BaseTermSim.BaseTermSim

A class to calculate similarity from a precomputed matrix Full details available in ggtk/PrecomputedMatrixTermSimilarity.hpp Designed to read an !Ontology Specific! similarity matrix, written by a TermSimilarityWriter.

class ggtk.TermSimilarity.TermSimilarityWriter(go_graph, anno_data)[source]¶

Bases: object

TermSimilarityWrite calculates and writes a term matrix for use with the PrecomputedMatrixTermSimilarity Full details are available in ggtk/TermSimilarityWriter.hpp
